name: Double-O Swampson
description:
Created for Mini-Jam 106: Frogs

Your name is Frogdrick Swampson, and you're an ex-spy. One day, you get a call from your old workplace. Your skills are required again. You may not have the same spunk and funk you had in your golden years, but you'll still save Swamp Valley, whatever it takes.

Your mission? To destroy a new machine being made by The Mosquito Clan. But when you finally confront them, something goes awry, and you're sent back to the past. Over and over. Until suddenly, you realize you have less and less time each time.

Your real mission is to invade the facility and do whatever you can to find a way to diffuse the machine and take down The Mosquito Clan once and for all, before you're out of time and get lost to the time-space continuum.

You've got no time to croak. Good luck, Swampson.
